summary: Ayleid inspired palace, Unique design, located southeast of Riften and past Forelhost, at the foot of the Jerall Mountains. Features all of the usual amenities, crafting, storage, displays. Follower and adoption friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#a4c2f4][size=6]Ayleid Palace[/size][/color]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61231-5-1420099276.jpg[/img]

[color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Updated version here[/size][/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79191/?]Ayleid Palace Remastered[/url]

Ayleid inspired palace, located southeast of Riften and past Forelhost at the foot of the Jerall Mountains. Look for a snowy path leading up to the palace (see map in the image section) Features lots of storage and displays for unique items.

There are two main files, one with NPC's and one without NPC's, only install one of them.

[color=#e06666]Requires all DLC's[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] required to move your family in (Cast the "Bless Home" spell)

Must be purchased for 50,000 gold - Click the sale sign.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61231-4-1420099276.png[/img]

[color=#a4c2f4][size=4]Sunafuken's version using Arri's Snow Elf Ruins Retexture[/size][/color]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61231-0-1449749100.png[/img]

[youtube]A0m76qBODgQ[/youtube] [youtube]rPOgCl5wXwk[/youtube]
[youtube]pdgiYWuPn8g[/youtube]

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]Features[/size][/color]
Main Hall - Dining, kitchen, Garden area, Reading Room
Display Hall - Library, Crafting, Displays
Bedrooms - Master, Kids (6 beds), Guest Rooms (18 beds)
Outdoor - Smithing, Pool
Auto undressing for NPC's at pools

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]Recommended mods[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple Floors Sandboxing by Dovahklon[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?]Jaxonz Positioner by Jaxonz[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/?]Jaxonz Renamer by Jaxonz[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62040/?]My Home Is Your Home[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33504/?]AlfheimKnights by Jgreybear[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35153/?]AlfheimRobes by jgreybear[/url]

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]For Oblivion[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/41076/?]Ayleid Ruins Replacer by jgreybear and AltheaR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/40378/?]Mafreseli - Dungeon and Player Home by AurianaValoria1[/url]  

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]My Homes[/size][/color]

files.name: Ayleid Palace v1.2 - WITH NPC's (Alternative Location)
files.fileName: Ayleid Palace v1.2 - WITH NPC's (Alternative Location)-61231-1-2.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Added Steps to Optional Version
Expanded Outside of Optional version
Fixed Location references of Optional Version
Reworked the Lighting
Added Enchanting Basin Outside
Many Small Fixes
